bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I buzz around flowers.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🟡 I am usually yellow and black.

bug.question: I make a home in the ground and carry things much bigger than myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🧺 I can carry food.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a cocoon, and finally fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves.
🎨 I have colorful wings.
🦋 I go through metamorphosis.

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat plants.
🦵 I have strong legs.
🎶 I make noise in the summer.

bug.question: I have bright red spots and am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots are usually black.
🌱 I eat other smaller bugs that eat plants.
🔴 I am often found in gardens.

bug.question: I light up at night with a glowing light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ My light helps me find a partner.
🌙 I am active when it's dark.
🔥 I don't actually produce heat, just light.

bug.question: I buzz and sting. Only the females do it and then die after stinging once. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a colony with a Queen.
🍯 I make honey.
⚠️ My stinger is left behind after stinging.

bug.question: I have a long, sticky tongue and catch my food mid-air. What am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I am often green or brown.
👁️ My eyes can move in different directions.
🌳 I blend into my surroundings very well.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, looking just like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I blend in with trees and bushes.
🌳 I am long and thin.
🚶 I move very slowly to avoid detection.

bug.question: I am a predator that is shaped like a leaf and can strike with lightning speed. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I fold my front legs as if praying.
🍃 I blend in with green foliage.
🦗 I eat other insects.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and roots, and I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
💧 I need water to live.
🌻 I can be big or small, like a flower or a tree.

plant.question: I am tall and green, and birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am a very large plant.
🐿️ Squirrels also like to climb on me.
🍁 I can have leaves that change color in the fall.

plant.question: I have beautiful colors and a sweet smell. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be many shapes and sizes.
🐝 I help make honey!
💐 People often give me as a gift.

plant.question: I grow underground and feed the plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Sometimes animals eat me.
🌱 I hold the plant in place.
🌿 I absorb water and nutrients.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad. Rabbits love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a type of leafy vegetable.
🥗 You might put dressing on me.
🐰 I am a rabbit's favorite snack.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Squirrels bury me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🐿️ Squirrels collect me for winter.
🌳 I fall from trees.

plant.question: I can be red, green, or yellow, and I grow on vines. You can make juice or raisins from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
☀️ I can be dried to make a sweet treat.
🍷 My juice is sometimes used to make wine, but not for kids!

plant.question: I am a type of plant that can live for many years, and I get bigger and stronger each year. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌿 I am a perennial, meaning I live more than two years.
🪴 I am not an annual, which means I don't need to be replanted every year.
🌳 I can be a shrub or a tree.

plant.question: I am a special type of plant that traps insects for food. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I am useful for controlling insects!
🌿 I grow in nutrient-poor soil.
🏆 I have a clever method to get food, other than soil.

plant.question: I'm a plant with a very tough stem, known for providing materials used in construction and sometimes eaten by pandas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 Pandas love to eat me!
🎋 I am fast growing.
🏠 I am used to make structures like houses and furniture.
